REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f5063 reute r f BC-GRUEN-MARKETING-<GMC> 03-17 0057

TEXT.TITLE: GRUEN MARKETING <GMC> SEES YEAR NET OFF
TEXT.BODY: Gruen Marketing Corp said it expects to report earnings for the year ended January 31 of 60 to 65 cts per share on about 7,309,000 average shares, down from 78 cts on 6,545,000 shares a year before. It said sales fell about 10 pct from the year-earlier 104.9 mln dlrs. Reuter
